redbluedex: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

redbluedex: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

b2w2dex: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
xdex: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
ydex: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.

rubydex: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks the foe courageously. The stronger the foes, the more intensely this Pokémon's wrists burn.
sapphiredex: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs - it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon's  leave its foes scorched and blackened.
emeralddex: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.
frlgdex: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
dpptdex: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
hgssdex: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
bwdex: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
b2w2dex: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
xdex: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
ydex: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.

rubydex: The fin on Mudkip's head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
sapphiredex: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash its amazing power - it can  bigger than itself.
emeralddex: On land, it can powerfully  by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water's edge.
frlgdex: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
dpptdex: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to lift boulders.
hgssdex: Its power can crush boulders. It rests by covering itself with mud at the bottom of a river.
bwdex: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to lift boulders.
b2w2dex: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

rubydex: The surface of Marshtomp's body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
sapphiredex: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon's hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
emeralddex: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by .
frlgdex: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.
dpptdex: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It  into dirt to sleep.
hgssdex: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.
bwdex: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
b2w2dex: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

rubydex: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily  weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
sapphiredex: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
emeralddex: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.
frlgdex: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nests at beautiful beaches.
dpptdex: It can swim while towing a large ship. It  foes with a swing of its thick arms.
hgssdex: Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can  into pieces.
bwdex: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
b2w2dex: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

rubydex: At first sight, Poochyena takes a  at anything that moves. This Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
sapphiredex: Poochyena is an omnivore - it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.
emeralddex: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.
frlgdex: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
dpptdex: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
hgssdex: It chases its prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it turns tail if the prey strikes back.
bwdex: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
b2w2dex: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
xdex: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
ydex: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without every losing track.

rubydex: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will  savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
sapphiredex: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only those trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
emeralddex: In the wild, Mightyena live in a pack. They never defy their leader's orders. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
frlgdex: It will always obey the commands of a skilled trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
dpptdex: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
hgssdex: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
bwdex: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
b2w2dex: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
xdex: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
ydex: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

rubydex: Zigzagoon restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This Pokémon does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
sapphiredex: The hair on Zigzagoon's back is bristly. It rubs the hard back hair against trees to leave its territorial markings. This Pokémon may play dead to fool foes in battle.
emeralddex: Rubbing its nose against the ground, it always wanders about back and forth in search of something. It is distinguished by the zigzag footprints it leaves.
frlgdex: A Pokémon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigs and zags.
dpptdex: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at  in the grass and even in the ground.
hgssdex: It gets interested in everything, which is why it zigs and zags. It is good at finding items.
bwdex: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
b2w2dex: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
xdex: It walks in zigzag fashion. It's good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
ydex: A Pokémon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigzags.

rubydex: Linoone always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This Pokémon is very challenged by gently curving roads.
sapphiredex: When hunting, Linoone will make a beeline straight for the prey at a full run. While this Pokémon is capable of topping , it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.
emeralddex: It is exceedingly fast if it only has to run in a straight line. When it spots pond-dwelling prey underwater, it quickly leaps in and catches it with its sharp claws.
frlgdex: When running in a straight line, it can top . However, it has a tough time with curved roads.
dpptdex: It charges prey at speeds over . However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
hgssdex: When running in a straight line, it can easily top . It has a tough time with curved roads.
bwdex: It charges prey at speeds over . However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
b2w2dex: It charges prey at speeds over . However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
xydex: When running in a straight line, it can easily top . It has a tough time with curved roads.

rubydex: Using the spikes on its rear end, Wurmple peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This Pokémon's feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
sapphiredex: Wurmple is targeted by  as prey. This Pokémon will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.
emeralddex: It sticks to tree branches and eats leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth, which becomes gooey when it touches air, slows the movement of its foes.
frlgdex: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.
diamonddex: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a , it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pearldex: It spits a white silk that turns sticky when it contacts air. It is used to immobilize foes.
platinumdex: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
hgssdex: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
bwdex: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
b2w2dex: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.

rubydex: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this Pokémon hangs quietly while it awaits [[evolution]]. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
sapphiredex: Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this Pokémon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.
emeralddex: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a . It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.
frlgdex: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.
diamonddex: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.
pearldex: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
platinumdex: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
hgssdex: Having wrapped silk around the branches of a tree, it quiescently awaits evolution.
bwdex: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
b2w2dex: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.

rubydex: Beautifly's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
sapphiredex: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
emeralddex: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.
frlgdex: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.
diamonddex: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.
pearldex: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
platinumdex: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
hgssdex: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
bwdex: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
b2w2dex: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.

rubydex: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its [[evolution]] inside the cocoon.
sapphiredex: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.
emeralddex: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.
frlgdex: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
diamonddex: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
pearldex: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
platinumdex: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
hgssdex: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.
bwdex: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
b2w2dex: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
xdex: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.

rubydex: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright light of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
sapphiredex: When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its antennae like radar.
emeralddex: It is a nocturnal Pokémon that flies from fields and mountains to the attraction of streetlights at night. It looses highly toxic powder from its wings.
frlgdex: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.
diamonddex: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pearldex: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
platinumdex: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
hgssdex: It scatters its fine dust all over when it is attacked. It is a nocturnal Pokémon.
bwdex: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
b2w2dex: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.

rubydex: Lotad live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this Pokémon travels on land in search of clean water.
sapphiredex: Lotad is said to have dwelled on land before. However, this Pokémon is thought to have returned to water because the leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating atop the water.
emeralddex: This Pokémon lives in ponds with clean water. It is known to ferry small Pokémon across ponds by carrying them on the broad leaf on its head.
frlgdex: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
dpptdex: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can't swim.
hgssdex: Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land. That is how it began to live floating in the water.
bwdex: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can't swim.
b2w2dex: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can't swim.
xdex: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can't swim.
ydex: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

rubydex: Lombre is nocturnal - it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief-maker. When this Pokémon spots [[Fishing|anglers]], it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.
sapphiredex: Lombre's entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this Pokémon's hands. Lombre is often mistaken for a human child.
emeralddex: In the evening, it takes great delight in popping out of rivers and startling people. It feeds on aquatic moss that grows on rocks in the riverbed.
frlgdex: It lives at the water's edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.
dpptdex: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
hgssdex: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.
bwdex: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
b2w2dex: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
xdex: It lives at the water's edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water-grass by day and becomes active at night.
ydex: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.

rubydex: Ludicolo begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This Pokémon is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.
sapphiredex: Upon hearing an upbeat and cheerful rhythm, the cells in Ludicolo's body become very energetic and active. Even in battle, this Pokémon will exhibit an amazing amount of power.
emeralddex: When it hears festive music, all the cells in its body become stimulated, and it begins moving in rhythm. It does not quail even when it faces a tough opponent.
frlgdex: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.
dpptdex: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.
hgssdex: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.
bwdex: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.
b2w2dex: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.
xdex: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.
ydex: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

rubydex: Seedot attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this Pokémon's body becomes.
sapphiredex: Seedot looks exactly like an acorn when it is dangling from a tree branch. It startles other Pokémon by suddenly moving. This Pokémon polishes its body once a day using leaves.
emeralddex: It hangs off branches and absorbs nutrients. When it finishes eating, its body becomes so heavy that it drops to the ground with a thump.
frlgdex: If it remains still, it becomes impossible to distinguish from real nuts. It delights in surprising foraging .
dpptdex: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
hgssdex: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
bwdex: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
b2w2dex: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.

rubydex: Nuzleaf live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to scare people. This Pokémon dislikes having its long nose pinched.
sapphiredex: This Pokémon pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute with it. The sound of Nuzleaf's flute strikes fear and uncertainty in the hearts of people lost in a forest.
emeralddex: A forest-dwelling Pokémon that is skilled at climbing trees. Its long and pointed nose is its weak point. It loses power if the nose is gripped.
frlgdex: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf's grass flute fills listeners with dread.
dpptdex: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
hgssdex: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
bwdex: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
b2w2dex: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.

rubydex: Shiftry is a mysterious Pokémon that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years. It creates  with the fans it holds.
sapphiredex: Shiftry's large fans generate awesome gusts of wind at a speed close to 100 feet per second. The whipped-up wind blows anything away. This Pokémon chooses to live quietly deep in forests.
emeralddex: It is said to arrive on chilly, wintry winds. Feared from long ago as the guardian of forests, this Pokémon lives in a deep forest where people do not venture.
frlgdex: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe's mind and take preemptive action.
dpptdex: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.
hgssdex: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create  with the fans it holds.
bwdex: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.
b2w2dex: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.

rubydex: Taillow courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This y Pokémon will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
sapphiredex: Taillow is young - it has only just left its nest. As a result, it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night. This Pokémon feeds on  that live in forests.
emeralddex: Although it is small, it is very courageous. It will take on a larger  on an equal footing. However, its will weakens if it becomes hungry.
frlgdex: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over  a day.
dpptdex: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
hgssdex: When it gets cold, they migrate, flying over  a day. It hunts for tasty prey.
bwdex: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
b2w2dex: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
xdex: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
ydex: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over  a day.

rubydex: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by Swellow's clawed feet, preventing escape.
sapphiredex: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other's wings.
emeralddex: A Swellow dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.
frlgdex: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
dpptdex: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
hgssdex: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.
bwdex: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
b2w2dex: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.

rubydex: Wingull has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This Pokémon rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
sapphiredex: Wingull rides updrafts rising from the sea by extending its long and narrow wings to glide. This Pokémon's long beak is useful for catching prey.
emeralddex: It makes its nest on a sheer cliff at the edge of the sea. It has trouble keeping its wings flapping in flight. Instead, it soars on updrafts.
frlgdex: It rides upon ocean winds as if it were a glider. In the [[seasons|winter]], it hides food around its nest.
diamonddex: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.
pearldex: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
platinumdex: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.
hgssdex: It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings. It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the sea’s edge.
bwdex: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.
b2w2dex: It makes its nest on sheer cliffs. Riding the sea breeze, it glides up into the expensive skies.
xdex: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
ydex: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.

rubydex: Pelipper is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon and s inside its massive bill. This Pokémon builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
sapphiredex: Pelipper searches for food while in flight by skimming the wave tops. This Pokémon dips its large bill in the sea to scoop up food, then  everything in one big gulp.
emeralddex: It skims the tops of waves as it flies. When it spots prey, it uses its large beak to scoop up the victim with water. It protects its eggs in its beak.
frlgdex: It is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon in its beak. It  to rest its wings.
diamonddex: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
pearldex: It acts as a delivery service by carrying small Pokémon in its bill. It bobs on the waves to rest.
platinumdex: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
hgssdex: It protects its young in its beak. It bobs on waves, resting on them on days when the waters are calm.
bwdex: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
b2w2dex: Skimming the water's surface, it dips its large bill in the sea, scoops up food and water, and carries it.
xdex: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.

rubydex: Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This Pokémon rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.
sapphiredex: Ralts has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its trainer is in a cheerful mood, this Pokémon grows cheerful and joyous in the same way.
emeralddex: A Ralts has the power to sense the emotions of people and Pokémon with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.
frlgdex: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.
dpdex: It uses the horns on its head to sense human emotions. It is said to appear in front of cheerful people.
platinumdex: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
hgssdex: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people’s emotions.
bwdex: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
b2w2dex: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
xdex: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
ydex: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if its senses hostility.

rubydex: It is said that a Kirlia that is exposed to the positive emotions of its  grows beautiful. This Pokémon controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
sapphiredex: Kirlia uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic power. When the Pokémon uses its power, the air around it becomes distorted, creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.
emeralddex: A Kirlia has the psychic power to create a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.
frlgdex: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
dpdex: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer's feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.
platinumdex: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
hgssdex: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
bwdex: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
b2w2dex: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
xdex: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
ydex: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

rubydex: Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its , this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
sapphiredex: Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This Pokémon will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.
emeralddex: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with  power. It will give its life to protect its Trainer.
frlgdex: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
dpdex: It will try to guard its trusted Trainer with its life. It has the ability to see the future.
platinumdex: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
hgssdex: It unleashes psychokinetic energy at full power when protecting a Trainer it has bonded closely with.
bwdex: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
b2w2dex: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
xdex: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
ydex: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

rubydex: From the tips of its feet, Surskit secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.
sapphiredex: If Surskit senses danger, it secretes a thick, sugary syrup from the tip of its head. There are some Pokémon that love eating this syrup.
emeralddex: They gather on puddles after evening downpours, gliding across the surface of water as if sliding. It secretes honey with a sweet aroma from its head.
frlgdex: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
dpptdex: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
hgssdex: It secretes a thick, sweet-scented syrup from the tip of its head. It lives on weed-choked ponds.
bwdex: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
b2w2dex: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
xdex: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
ydex: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

rubydex: Masquerain s enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This Pokémon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.
sapphiredex: Masquerain's antennas have eyelike patterns that usually give it an angry look. If the "eyes" are droopy and appear sad, it is said to be a sign that a heavy rainfall is on its way.
emeralddex: It intimidates foes with the large eyelike patterns on its antennae. Because it can't fly if its wings get wet, it shelters itself from rain under large trees and eaves.
frlgdex: The antennae have distinctive patterns that look like eyes. When it rains, they grow heavy, making flight impossible.
dpptdex: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
hgssdex: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and fro and sideways.
bwdex: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
b2w2dex: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
xdex: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
ydex: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and fro and sideways.

rubydex: Shroomish live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This Pokémon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
sapphiredex: If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon's spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.
emeralddex: It loves to eat damp, composted soil in forests. If you enter a forest after a long rain, you can see many Shroomish feasting on composted soil.
frlgdex: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases  from its head.
dpptdex: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
hgssdex: If it senses danger, it scatters spores from the top of its head to protect itself.
bwdex: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
b2w2dex: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.

rubydex: Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokémon's fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
sapphiredex: The seeds ringing Breloom's tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokémon's seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
emeralddex: It  from holes in the cap on its head. It loves warm and humid climates. It feeds on trees and plants in fields and forests.
frlgdex: The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible .
dpptdex: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
hgssdex: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
bwdex: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
b2w2dex: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
ydex: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.

rubydex: Slakoth  for over twenty hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This Pokémon's sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
sapphiredex: Slakoth's heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to  motionless. It is rare to see this Pokémon in motion.
emeralddex: It  virtually all day and night long. It doesn't change its nest its entire life, but it sometimes travels great distances by swimming in rivers.
frlgdex: It sleeps for 20 hours every day.  those that see it is one of its abilities.
dpptdex: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
hgssdex: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.
bwdex: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
b2w2dex: If it eats just three leaves in a day, it is satisfied. Other than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.

rubydex: Vigoroth is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can't tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This Pokémon's stress level rises if it can't be moving constantly.
sapphiredex: Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.
emeralddex: It can't keep still because its blood boils with energy. It runs through the fields and mountains all day to calm itself. If it doesn't, it  at night.
frlgdex: It is always hungry because it won't stop rampaging. Even while it is eating, it can't keep still.
dpptdex: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still even for a moment.
hgssdex: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.
bwdex: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still even for a moment.
b2w2dex: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood is so agitated that it can't sit still for one second.

rubydex: Slaking spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this Pokémon reluctantly moves to another spot.
sapphiredex: Wherever Slaking lives, rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.
emeralddex: Hordes of Slaking gather around trees when fruits come into season. They wait around patiently for ripened fruits to fall out of the trees.
frlgdex: It is the world's most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
dpptdex: The world's laziest Pokémon. When it is , it is actually saving energy for striking back.
hgssdex: The world's laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there's no food left within its reach.
bwdex: The world's laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
b2w2dex: This Pokémon lives lying on its side. It only rolls over and moves when there is no more grass to eat.

rubydex: Nincada lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This Pokémon absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for [[evolution]].
sapphiredex: Nincada lives underground. It uses its sharp claws to carve the roots of trees and absorb moisture and nutrients. This Pokémon can't withstand bright sunlight so avoids it.
emeralddex: It makes its nest at the roots of a mighty tree. Using its whiskerlike antennae, it probes its surroundings in the pitch-black darkness of soil.
frlgdex: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
dpptdex: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
hgssdex: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
bwdex: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
b2w2dex: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
xdex: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
ydex: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.

rubydex: Ninjask moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this Pokémon was long believed to be invisible.
sapphiredex: If Ninjask is not trained properly, it will refuse to obey the Trainer and cry loudly continuously. Because of this quality, this Pokémon is said to be one that puts the Trainer's abilities to the test.
emeralddex: Because it darts about vigorously at high speed, it is very difficult to see. Hearing its distinctive cries for too long induces a headache.
frlgdex: This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
dpptdex: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
hgssdex: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
bwdex: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
b2w2dex: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

rubydex: Shedinja's hard body doesn't move - not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this Pokémon will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
sapphiredex: Shedinja is a peculiar Pokémon. It seems to appear unsought in a [[Poké Ball]] after a  evolves. This bizarre Pokémon is entirely immobile - it doesn't even breathe.
emeralddex: A peculiar Pokémon that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still. The inside of its body is hollow and utterly dark.
frlgdex: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.
dpptdex: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.
hgssdex: A strange Pokémon--it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.
bwdex: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.
b2w2dex: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.
xdex: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.
ydex: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.

rubydex: Normally, Whismur's voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this Pokémon senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
sapphiredex: Whismur is very timid. If it starts to , it becomes startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally stops crying, the Pokémon goes to sleep, all tired out.
emeralddex: Its cries equal a jet plane in volume. It inhales through its ear canals. Because of this system, it can cry continually without having to catch its breath.
frlgdex: It usually murmurs, but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
dpptdex: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
hgssdex: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.
bwdex: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
b2w2dex: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
xdex: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
ydex: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.

rubydex: Loudred's bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its  to punish its foes. This Pokémon's round ears serve as loudspeakers.
sapphiredex: Loudred shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes shouting, this Pokémon becomes incapable of hearing anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.
emeralddex: It positions the round speakers on its head to assail foes with  waves at massive volume. It builds power by ing the ground.
frlgdex: When it stomps its feet and bellows, it generates ultrasonic waves that can blow apart a house.
dpptdex: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
hgssdex: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then using its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
bwdex: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
b2w2dex: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
xdex: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then using its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.

rubydex: Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this Pokémon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it's a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
sapphiredex: Exploud communicates its feelings to others by emitting whistle-like sounds from the tubes of its body. This Pokémon only raises its voice when it is in battle.
emeralddex: It has sound-generating organs all over its body. It communicates with others by adjusting the tone and volume of the cries it emits.
frlgdex: It emits a variety of sounds from the holes all over its body. Its  can be heard from over  away.
dpptdex: Its howls can be heard over  away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
hgssdex: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an  has struck.
bwdex: Its howls can be heard over  away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
b2w2dex: Its howls can be heard over  away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
ydex: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an earthquake has struck.

rubydex: Makuhita is tenacious - it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this Pokémon stores more energy in its body for [[Evolution|evolving]].
sapphiredex: Makuhita has a tireless spirit - it will never give up hope. It eats a lot of food, gets plenty of sleep, and it trains very rigorously. By living that way, this Pokémon packs its body with energy.
emeralddex: It loves to toughen up its body above all else. If you hear quaking rumbles in a cave, it is the sound of Makuhita undertaking strenuous training.
frlgdex: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.
dpptdex: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
hgssdex: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
bwdex: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
b2w2dex: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
xdex: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
ydex: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.

rubydex: Hariyama practices its  in any number of locations. One hit of this Pokémon's powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.
sapphiredex: Hariyama's thick body , but it is actually a hunk of solid muscle. If this Pokémon bears down and tightens all its muscles, its body becomes as hard as a rock.
emeralddex: It has the habit of challenging others without hesitation to tests of strength. It's been known to stand on train tracks and stop trains using forearm thrusts.
frlgdex: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
dpptdex: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
hgssdex: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.
bwdex: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
b2w2dex: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
xdex: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
ydex: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.

rubydex: Azurill spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these Pokémon managed to hurl itself a record .
sapphiredex: Azurill's tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this Pokémon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.
emeralddex: Its tail, which is packed with nutrition, is very bouncy like a rubber ball. On sunny days they gather at the edge of water and splash about for fun.
frlgdex: It battles by flinging around its tail, which is bigger than its body. The tail is a floatation device in water.
diamonddex: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
pearldex: Its tail is filled with nutrients necessary for growth. It plays by bouncing on its tail.
platinumdex: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
hgssdex: Its tail is packed full of the nutrients it needs to grow.
bwdex: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
b2w2dex: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
xdex: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
ydex: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.

rubydex: Nosepass's magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these Pokémon meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.
sapphiredex: Nosepass had been said to be completely unmoving, with its magnetic nose pointed due north. However, close observation has revealed that the Pokémon actually moves by a little over 3/8 of an inch every year.
emeralddex: Its body emits a powerful magnetism. It feeds on prey that is pulled in by the force. Its magnetism is stronger in cold seasons.
frlgdex: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
dpdex: Its nose is a magnet. As a result, this Pokémon always keeps its face pointing north.
platinumdex: When endangered, it may protect itself by raising its magnetism and drawing iron objects to its body.
hgssdex: If two of these meet, they cannot get too close because their noses repel each other.
bwdex: When endangered, it may protect itself by raising its magnetism and drawing iron objects to its body.
b2w2dex: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
xdex: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
ydex: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.

rubydex: Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This Pokémon is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
sapphiredex: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.
emeralddex: A Skitty's adorably cute behavior makes it highly popular. In battle, it makes its tail puff out. It threatens foes with a sharp .
frlgdex: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. However, it is extremely popular for its cute looks and behavior.
dpptdex: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
hgssdex: It's adorable when it chases its own tail. It's difficult to earn its trust.
bwdex: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
b2w2dex: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.
xdex: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
ydex: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.

rubydex: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
sapphiredex: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight - it will just move away somewhere else.
emeralddex: Rather than keeping a permanent lair, it habitually seeks comfortable spots and sleeps there. It is nocturnal and becomes active at dusk.
frlgdex: The favorite of trend-conscious female s, they are used in competition for their style and fur.
dpptdex: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
hgssdex: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
bwdex: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
b2w2dex: The reason it does not have a nest is that it simply searches for a clean, comfortable place then sleeps there.
xdex: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
ydex: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.

rubydex: Sableye lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these Pokémon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
sapphiredex: Sableye digs the ground with sharpened claws to find rocks that it eats. Substances in the eaten rocks crystallize and rise up to the Pokémon's body surface.
emeralddex: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food--raw gems. A Sableye lurks in darkness and is seen only rarely.
frlgdex: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
dpptdex: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
hgssdex: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
bwdex: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
b2w2dex: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
xdex: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
ydex: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.

rubydex: huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it,  chomps it with its gaping jaws.
sapphiredex: Don't be taken by this Pokémon's cute face - it's very dangerous. Mawile fools the foe into letting down its guard then chomps down with its massive jaws. The steel jaws are really horns that have been transformed.
emeralddex: Its giant jaws are actually steel horns that transformed. It fools foes into complacency with its adorable gestures, then chomps them with its huge jaws.
frlgdex: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
dpptdex: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
hgssdex: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
bwdex: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
b2w2dex: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
xdex: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
ydex: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

rubydex: This Pokémon has a body of steel. To make its body, Aron feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
sapphiredex: Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this Pokémon can demolish even a heavy dump truck. The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal for the Pokémon.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that is clad in steel armor. A new suit of armor is made when it evolves. The old, discarded armor is salvaged as metal for making iron products.
frlgdex: It eats iron to build its steel body. It is a pest that descends from mountains to eat bridges and train tracks.
dpptdex: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
hgssdex: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.
bwdex: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
b2w2dex: In order to build up its steel body, it eats iron ore. This pesky Pokémon is known to eat railroad tracks.
xdex: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
ydex: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.

rubydex: Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokémon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
sapphiredex: Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result, the Pokémon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.
emeralddex: When two Lairon meet in the wild, they fight for territory by bashing into each other with their steel bodies. The sound of their collision carries for miles.
frlgdex: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.
dpptdex: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
hgssdex: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
bwdex: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
b2w2dex: Lairon fight over territory, and when their steel bodies collide, sparks fly.
xdex: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
ydex: It habitually shows off its strength with the sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.

rubydex: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This Pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
sapphiredex: Aggron is surprisingly protective of its environment. If its mountain is ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this Pokémon will haul topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its own territory.
emeralddex: Its iron horns grow longer a little at a time. They are used to determine the Aggron's age. The gouges in its armor are worn with pride as mementos from battles.
frlgdex: It claims a large mountain as its sole territory. It mercilessly thrashes those that violate its space.
dpptdex: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
hgssdex: You can tell its age by the length of its iron horns. It claims an entire mountain as its territory.
bwdex: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
b2w2dex: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don't take it lightly.
xdex: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don't take it lightly.
ydex: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.

rubydex: Meditite undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this Pokémon always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.
sapphiredex: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one [[berry]] a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokémon's training.
emeralddex: It continually meditates for hours every day. As a result of rigorous and dedicated yoga training, it has tempered its spiritual power so much it can fly.
frlgdex: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.
diamonddex: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.
pearldex: It never misses its daily yoga workouts, and it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
platinumdex: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
hgssdex: It meditates to heighten its inner energy and to float in the air. It eats one berry a day.
bwdex: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
b2w2dex: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
xdex: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
ydex: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.

rubydex: It is said that through meditation, Medicham heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This Pokémon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
sapphiredex: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed a sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to  for a whole month without eating.
emeralddex: Through crushingly harsh yoga training, it gained the power to . It battles with elegant, dance-like movement.
frlgdex: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
diamonddex: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its movements are elegant.
pearldex: Through daily meditation, it hones its spiritual power. It can sense what others are thinking.
platinumdex: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
hgssdex: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to .
bwdex: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
b2w2dex: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
xdex: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
ydex: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.

rubydex: Electrike stores electricity in its long body hair. This Pokémon stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.
sapphiredex: Electrike runs faster than the human eye can follow. The friction from running is converted into electricity, which is then stored in this Pokémon's fur.
emeralddex: It generates electricity using friction from the atmosphere. In seasons with especially arid air, its entire body blazes with violent showers of s.
frlgdex: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
dpptdex: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
hgssdex: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.
bwdex: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
b2w2dex: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
xdex: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
ydex: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

rubydex: Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this Pokémon creates thunderclouds.
sapphiredex: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This Pokémon creates thunderclouds above its head.
emeralddex: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, Manectric were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.
frlgdex: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
dpptdex: It s electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to .
hgssdex: Its nest can be found where a  hits. It is discharging electricity from its mane.
bwdex: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
b2w2dex: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
xdex: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
ydex: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

rubydex: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this Pokémon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
sapphiredex: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon cries loudly.
emeralddex: It has the trait of cheering on its fellow Pokémon. By shorting out the electricity it releases from its paws, it creates pom-poms for cheering.
frlgdex: It cheers on partners while scattering sparks from its body. It climbs telephone poles to absorb electricity.
dpptdex: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
hgssdex: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.
bwdex: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
b2w2dex: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
xdex: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
ydex: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.

rubydex: Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
sapphiredex: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this Pokémon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.
emeralddex: At a meeting of Pokémon academics, it was announced that simultaneous exposure to electricity from a Plusle and Minun will promote circulation and boost vitality.
frlgdex: Its dislike of water makes it take shelter under the eaves of houses in rain. It uses pom-poms made of sparks for cheering.
dpptdex: It cheers on its friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
hgssdex: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
bwdex: It cheers on its friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
b2w2dex: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
xdex: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
ydex: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

rubydex: With the arrival of night, Volbeat emits . It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This Pokémon is attracted by the  of .
sapphiredex: Volbeat's tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.
emeralddex: With their taillights lit, Volbeat fly in a swarm, drawing geometric designs in the night sky. They move their nests if their pond water becomes dirty.
frlgdex: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.
dpptdex: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise's sweet aroma.
hgssdex: It emits light from its tail to communicate. It loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.
bwdex: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise's sweet aroma.
b2w2dex: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise's sweet aroma.
xdex: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise's sweet aroma.
ydex: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.

rubydex: Illumise attracts a swarm of  using a sweet. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this Pokémon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
sapphiredex: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
emeralddex: A nocturnal Pokémon that becomes active upon nightfall. It leads a Volbeat swarm to draw patterns in the night sky. Over 200 different patterns have been confirmed.
frlgdex: It guides Volbeat to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.
dpptdex: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
hgssdex: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
bwdex: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
b2w2dex: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
xdex: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
ydex: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.

rubydex: Roselia shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this Pokémon brings serenity to living things.
sapphiredex: On extremely rare occasions, a Roselia is said to appear with its flowers in [[Shiny Pokémon|unusual colors]]. The thorns on this Pokémon's head contain a vicious poison.
emeralddex: A Roselia that drinks nutritionally rich springwater blooms with lovely flowers. The fragrance of its flowers has the effect of making its foes careless.
frlgdex: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.
diamonddex: Roselia raised on clean drinking water are known to grow vividly colored flowers.
pearldex: The beautiful flowers on its arms have . Don't even think about picking those flowers.
platinumdex: The more healthy the Roselia, the more pleasant its flowers' aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.
hgssdex: Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.
bwdex: The more healthy the Roselia, the more pleasant its flowers' aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.
b2w2dex: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
xdex: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
ydex: Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.

rubydex: Virtually all of Gulpin's body is its stomach. As a result, it can  something its own size. This Pokémon's stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.
sapphiredex: Most of Gulpin's body is made up of its stomach - its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon's stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.
emeralddex: This Pokémon's stomach fluid can even digest scrap iron. In one gulp, it can swallow something that is as large as itself.
frlgdex: There is nothing its stomach can't digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.
dpptdex: Almost all of its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
hgssdex: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach compromises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
bwdex: Almost all of its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
b2w2dex: Almost all of its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
xdex: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach compromises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
ydex: There is nothing its stomach can't digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.

rubydex: When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this Pokémon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
sapphiredex: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon's mouth.
emeralddex: Its powerful stomach acid is capable of digesting almost anything. The one thing in the whole world a Swalot can't digest is its own stomach.
frlgdex: It can  a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.
dpptdex: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
hgssdex: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.
bwdex: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
b2w2dex: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
xdex: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
ydex: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.

rubydex: Carvanha's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokémon.
sapphiredex: If anything invades Carvanha's territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this Pokémon turns suddenly timid.
emeralddex: Carvanha attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious Pokémon, it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.
frlgdex: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
dpptdex: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
hgssdex: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
bwdex: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
b2w2dex: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
xdex: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
ydex: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

rubydex: Nicknamed "the bully of the sea," Sharpedo is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these Pokémon can thoroughly tear apart a .
sapphiredex: Sharpedo can swim at speeds of up to  by jetting seawater out of its backside. This Pokémon's drawback is its inability to swim long distances.
emeralddex: The vicious and sly gangster of the sea. Its skin is specially textured to minimize drag in water. Its speed tops out at over  per hour.
frlgdex: The ruffian of the seas, it has fangs that  through iron. It swims by jetting water from its rear.
dpptdex: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at  and is known as "The Bully of the Sea."
hgssdex: It can swim at speeds of  by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.
bwdex: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at  and is known as "The Bully of the Sea."
b2w2dex: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at  and is known as "The Bully of the Sea."
xdex: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at  and is known as "The Bully of the Sea."
ydex: It can swim at speeds of  by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.

rubydex: Wailmer's nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful Pokémon loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
sapphiredex: Wailmer can store water inside its body to transform itself into a ball for bouncing on the ground. By filling itself up with more water, this Pokémon can elevate the height of its bounces.
emeralddex: While this Pokémon usually lives in the sea, it can survive on land, although not too long. It loses vitality if its body becomes dried out.
frlgdex: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.
dpptdex: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It  from its nose.
hgssdex: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
bwdex: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.
b2w2dex: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.
