xdex: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
ydex: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.

rubydex: Wailord is the largest of all identified Pokémon up to now. This giant Pokémon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
sapphiredex: When chasing prey, Wailord herds them by leaping out of the water and making a humongous . It is breathtaking to see this Pokémon leaping out of the sea with others in its pod.
emeralddex: It breathes through nostrils that it raises above the sea. By inhaling to its maximum capacity, a Wailord can dive close to 10,000 feet beneath the waves.
frlgdex: It is among the largest of all Pokémon. It herds prey in a pack then swallows the massed prey in one gulp.
dpptdex: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can  to a depth of almost  on only one breath.
hgssdex: It is the largest of all identified Pokémon. They jump as a pack to herd their prey.
bwdex: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost  on only one breath.
b2w2dex: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
xdex: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.

rubydex: Numel is extremely dull witted - it doesn't notice being hit. However, it can't stand hunger for even a second. This Pokémon's body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
sapphiredex: Numel stores magma of almost  within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens. In that event, the Pokémon's body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.
emeralddex: A Numel stores boiling magma in the hump on its back. It is a hardy Pokémon that can transport a  load. It has served humans at work since long ago.
frlgdex: Magma of almost  courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.
dpptdex: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
hgssdex: The flaming magma it stores in the hump on its back is the source of its tremendous power.
bwdex: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
b2w2dex: The magma in its body reaches . Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.

rubydex: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of  courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon's back , spewing the superheated magma.
sapphiredex: The humps on Camerupt's back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that lives in the crater of a volcano. Every 10 years, the volcanoes on its back erupt violently. Research is under way on the cause of eruption.
frlgdex: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
dpptdex: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
hgssdex: It lives in the crater of a volcano. It is well known that the humps on its back erupt every 10 years.
bwdex: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
b2w2dex: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years -- or whenever it becomes really angry.
xdex: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years -- or whenever it becomes really angry.
ydex: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.

rubydex: Torkoal digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this Pokémon spouts thick  to beat a retreat.
sapphiredex: Torkoal generates energy by burning coal. It grows weaker as the fire dies down. When it is preparing for battle, this Pokémon burns more coal.
emeralddex: It battles using energy it gets from burning coal. When loosing smoke from its nostrils, it lets off a sound that is similar to a locomotive's horn.
frlgdex: It burns coal inside its shell. If it is attacked, it belches thick, black smoke and flees.
dpptdex: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
hgssdex: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
bwdex: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
b2w2dex: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
xdex: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
ydex: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

rubydex: Spoink s around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this Pokémon cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.
sapphiredex: Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this Pokémon's psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that manipulates  power at will. It doesn't stop bouncing even when it is asleep. It loves eating mushrooms that grow underground.
frlgdex: It apparently dies if it stops bouncing about. It carries a pearl from  on its head.
dpptdex: It bounces constantly, using its tail as a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
hgssdex: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.
bwdex: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
b2w2dex: Using its tail like a spring, it keeps its heart beating by bouncing constantly. If it stops, it dies.
xdex: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
ydex: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.

rubydex: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its  for gaining total control over its foe. When this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
sapphiredex: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon's black pearls are valuable as works of art.
emeralddex: It stores power in the black pearls on its forehead. When it uses psychic power, it performs an odd dance step. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
frlgdex: It can gain control over foes by doing odd dance steps. The black pearls on its forehead are precious gems.
dpptdex: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
hgssdex: It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
bwdex: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
b2w2dex: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes' minds.
ydex: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.

rubydex: All the Spinda that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this Pokémon give it the .
sapphiredex: No two Spinda are said to have identical spot patterns on their hides. This Pokémon moves in a curious manner as if it is stumbling in dizziness. Its lurching movements can cause the opponent to become confused.
emeralddex: It is distinguished by a pattern of spots that is always different. Its unsteady, tottering walk has the effect of fouling its foe's aim.
frlgdex: No two Spinda are said to have identical patterns. It confuses foes with its stumbling motions.
dpptdex: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
hgssdex: The chances of two Spinda having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.
bwdex: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
b2w2dex: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
xdex: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
ydex: The chance of two Spinda having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.

rubydex: Trapinch's nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This Pokémon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
sapphiredex: Trapinch is a patient hunter. It digs an inescapable pit in a desert and waits for its prey to come tumbling down. This Pokémon can go a whole week without access to any water.
emeralddex: Its big jaws  through boulders. Because its head is so big, it has a hard time getting back upright if it tips over onto its back.
frlgdex: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
dpptdex: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
hgssdex: Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.
bwdex: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
b2w2dex: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
xdex: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
ydex: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

rubydex: To make prey faint, Vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This Pokémon's  are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
sapphiredex: Vibrava's wings have not yet completed the process of growing. Rather than flying long distances, they are more useful for generating ultrasonic waves by vibrating.
emeralddex: It looses ultrasonic waves by rubbing its wings together. Since a Vibrava's wings are still in the process of growing, it can only fly short distances.
frlgdex: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.
dpptdex: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
hgssdex: It vibrates its wings vigorously, creating ultrasonic waves that cause serious headaches.
bwdex: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
b2w2dex: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
ydex: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.

rubydex: Flygon is nicknamed "the elemental spirit of the desert." Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this Pokémon is always enveloped in a  while flying.
sapphiredex: Flygon whips up a sandstorm by flapping its wings. The wings create a series of notes that sound like singing. Because the "singing" is the only thing that can be heard in a sandstorm, this Pokémon is said to be the desert spirit.
emeralddex: The flapping of its wings sounds like singing. To prevent detection by enemies, it hides itself by flapping up a cloud of desert sand.
frlgdex: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
dpptdex: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as "The Desert Spirit."
hgssdex: It is nicknamed "The Desert Spirit" because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
bwdex: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as "The Desert Spirit."
b2w2dex: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.
xdex: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
ydex: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

rubydex: Cacnea lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this Pokémon  from its body to bring the victim down.
sapphiredex: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by wildly swinging its .
emeralddex: Cacnea live in deserts with virtually no rainfall. It battles by swinging its thick, spiked arms. Once a year, a yellow flower blooms.
frlgdex: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
dpptdex: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
hgssdex: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.
bwdex: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
b2w2dex: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.

rubydex: During the daytime, Cacturne remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This Pokémon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
sapphiredex: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
emeralddex: After spending thousands of years in harsh deserts, its blood transformed into the same substances as sand. It is nocturnal, so it hunts at night.
frlgdex: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert's heat.
dpptdex: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.
hgssdex: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.
bwdex: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.
b2w2dex: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.
ydex: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.

rubydex: Swablu has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This Pokémon is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
sapphiredex: Swablu loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty, it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings become dirty, this Pokémon finds a stream and showers itself.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, Swablu flocks move closer to towns in the spring.
frlgdex: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
dpdex: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone's head, it looks like a cotton hat.
platinumdex: It can't relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
hgssdex: Its wings bring cottony clouds to mind. It grooms with springwater and loves to sit on heads.
bwdex: It can't relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
b2w2dex: For some reason, it likes to land on people's heads softly and act like it's a hat.
xdex: For some reason, it likes to land on people's heads softly and act like it's a hat.
ydex: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

rubydex: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
sapphiredex: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.
emeralddex: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky. It launches intensely hot fireballs from its mouth.
frlgdex: If you hear a beautiful melody trilling deep among mountains far from people, it is Altaria's humming.
dpdex: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.
platinumdex: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
hgssdex: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.
bwdex: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
b2w2dex: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
xdex: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.
ydex: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

rubydex: Memories of battling its arch-rival  are etched into every cell of Zangoose's body. This Pokémon adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
sapphiredex: Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.
emeralddex: When it battles, it stands on its hind legs and attacks with its sharply clawed forelegs. Its fur bristles if it encounters any Seviper.
frlgdex: If it comes across a Seviper, its fur bristles and it assumes its battle pose. Its sharp claws are its best weapon.
dpptdex: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
hgssdex: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.
bwdex: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
b2w2dex: It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten those it encounters, it fans out the claws on its front paws.
xdex: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
ydex: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.

rubydex: Seviper shares a generations-long feud with . The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This Pokémon attacks using its sword-edged tail.
sapphiredex: Seviper's swordlike tail serves two purposes - it slashes foes and douses them with . This Pokémon will not give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.
emeralddex: Seviper and Zangoose are eternal rivals. It counters a Zangoose's dazzling agility with its swordlike tail, which also oozes a horrible poison.
frlgdex: It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with .
dpptdex: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
hgssdex: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
bwdex: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
b2w2dex: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It's Zangoose's archrival.
xdex: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
ydex: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It's Zangoose's archrival.

rubydex: Lunatone was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this Pokémon came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
sapphiredex: Lunatone becomes active around the time of the full moon. Instead of walking, it moves by floating in midair using telekinesis. The Pokémon's intimidating red eyes cause all those who see it to become transfixed with fear.
emeralddex: It becomes very active on the night of a full moon. This Pokémon was first discovered 40 years ago at the site of a meteor strike.
frlgdex: Its health ebbs and flows with the lunar cycle. It brims with power when exposed to the light of the full moon.
dpptdex: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
hgssdex: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
bwdex: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
b2w2dex: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It's active on the night of a full moon.
xdex: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
ydex: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

rubydex: Solrock is a new species of Pokémon that is said to have fallen from space. It  and moves silently. In battle, this Pokémon releases intensely bright light.
sapphiredex: Sunlight is the source of Solrock's power. It is said to possess the ability to read the emotions of others. This Pokémon gives off intense heat while rotating its body.
emeralddex: Solar energy is the source of this Pokémon's power. On sunny days, groups of Solrock line up facing the sun and absorb its light.
frlgdex: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.
dpptdex: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.
hgssdex: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.
bwdex: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.
b2w2dex: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
xdex: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
ydex: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.

rubydex: Barboach's sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This Pokémon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
sapphiredex: Barboach's body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this Pokémon just slips out of the enemy's grip. This Pokémon grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.
emeralddex: Its body is covered with a slimy film. The film acts as a barrier to prevent germs in muddy water from entering the Barboach's body.
frlgdex: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.
diamonddex: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pearldex: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
platinumdex: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
hgssdex: Barboach uses its whiskers to taste things just as a person uses his or her tongue to taste things.
bwdex: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
b2w2dex: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
xdex: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
ydex: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.

rubydex: Whiscash is extremely territorial. Just one of these Pokémon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it es about and triggers a massive .
sapphiredex: If Whiscash goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over . This Pokémon has the ability to predict real earthquakes.
emeralddex: Mysteriously, it can foretell earthquakes. In the daytime, it sleeps in mud at the bottom of a pond. When it awakens, it continually feeds throughout the night.
frlgdex: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything - if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
diamonddex: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a  radius.
pearldex: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to  real earthquakes.
platinumdex: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
hgssdex: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
bwdex: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
b2w2dex: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
xdex: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
ydex: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything - if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.

rubydex: Corphish were originally foreign Pokémon that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This Pokémon is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
sapphiredex: Corphish catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food - it will eat anything. This Pokémon has no trouble living in filthy water.
emeralddex: Once it grips prey with its large pincers, it will never let go, no matter what. It is a hardy Pokémon that can thrive in any environment.
frlgdex: It came from overseas. It is a very hardy creature that will quickly proliferate, even in polluted streams.
dpptdex: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
hgssdex: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
bwdex: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
b2w2dex: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
xdex: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
ydex: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

rubydex: Crawdaunt has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this Pokémon, making them desolate places.
sapphiredex: Crawdaunt molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell s, this Pokémon hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.
emeralddex: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. A veteran Crawdaunt that has prevailed in hundreds of battles has giant pincers marked with countless scars.
frlgdex: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
dpptdex: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
hgssdex: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
bwdex: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
b2w2dex: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.
xdex: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
ydex: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.

rubydex: Baltoy moves while  around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this Pokémon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
sapphiredex: As soon as it spots others of its kind, Baltoy congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This Pokémon sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.
emeralddex: A Baltoy moves by spinning on its single foot. It has been depicted in murals adorning the walls of a once-bustling city in an ancient age.
frlgdex: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
dpptdex: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
hgssdex: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
bwdex: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
b2w2dex: Discovered in ancient ruins, it moves by spinning around and forms a group when it finds others.

rubydex: Claydol are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This Pokémon moves about while .
sapphiredex: Claydol is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20,000 years. This Pokémon shoots  from both its hands.
emeralddex: A Claydol sleeps while hovering in midair. Its arms are separate from its body. They are kept floating by the Pokémon's manipulation of  power.
frlgdex: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
dpptdex: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
hgssdex: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.
bwdex: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
b2w2dex: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.

rubydex: Lileep became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient Pokémon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
sapphiredex: Lileep is an ancient Pokémon that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch, this Pokémon intently scans for prey with its two eyes.
emeralddex: It disguises itself as seaweed by making its tentacles sway. Unsuspecting prey that come too close are swallowed whole. It became extinct 100 million years ago.
frlgdex: It became extinct roughly 100 million years ago. It was regenerated from a fossil using advanced techniques.
dpptdex: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
hgssdex: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
bwdex: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
b2w2dex: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
xdex: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.

rubydex: Cradily roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This Pokémon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and  unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
sapphiredex: Cradily's body serves as an , preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This Pokémon secretes a strong  from its tentacles.
emeralddex: It drags its heavy body along the seafloor. It makes its nest in the shallows of warm seas. Cradily can be seen on beaches when the tide goes out.
frlgdex: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
dpptdex: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up its prey from the beaches.
hgssdex: It lives in warm seas. Its heavy body weighs it down so it won't get washed away in rough weather.
bwdex: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up its prey from the beaches.
b2w2dex: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up its prey from the beaches.

rubydex: Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive Pokémon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
sapphiredex: Anorith is said to be a type of Pokémon predecessor, with eight wings at the sides of its body. This Pokémon swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.
emeralddex: It was resurrected from a fossil using the power of science. It swims by undulating the eight wings at its sides. They were feet that adapted to life in the sea.
frlgdex: It is a kind of Pokémon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
dpptdex: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
hgssdex: An ancestral Pokémon that lived in the ocean. Over time, its eight feet transformed into wings.
bwdex: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
b2w2dex: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.

rubydex: Armaldo's tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This Pokémon's two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
sapphiredex: Armaldo is a Pokémon species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This Pokémon is said to have walked on its hind legs, which would have been more convenient for life on land.
emeralddex: Armaldo usually lives on land. However, when it hunts for prey, it dives beneath the ocean. It swims around using its two large wings.
frlgdex: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
dpptdex: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a .
hgssdex: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
bwdex: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
b2w2dex: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

rubydex: Feebas's fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this Pokémon is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
sapphiredex: While Feebas's body is in tatters, it has a hardy and tenacious life force that enables it to live anywhere. However, this Pokémon is also slow and dimwitted, making it an easy catch.
emeralddex: Feebas live in ponds that are heavily infested with weeds. Because of its hopelessly shabby appearance, it seems as if few s raise it.
frlgdex: Ridiculed for its shabby appearance, it is ignored by researchers. It lives in ponds choked with weeds.
diamonddex: It is famous for its shabby appearance. While populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.
pearldex: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
platinumdex: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
hgssdex: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and live at the bottom of rivers.
bwdex: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
b2w2dex: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.

rubydex: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all the Pokémon. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
sapphiredex: Milotic live at the bottom of large lakes. When this Pokémon's body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to restless spirits.
emeralddex: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all Pokémon, it has been depicted in paintings and statues.
frlgdex: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
diamonddex: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
pearldex: It is the world's most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.
platinumdex: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
hgssdex: It's said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you're feeling.
bwdex: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
b2w2dex: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.

rubydex: Kecleon is capable of  at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this Pokémon can't change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
sapphiredex: Kecleon alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that has the ability to alter its body colors to match its surroundings. A Kecleon reverts to its original colors if it is startled.
frlgdex: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. It also changes color if it is happy or sad.
dpptdex: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.
hgssdex: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.
bwdex: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.
b2w2dex: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.
xdex: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.
ydex: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.

rubydex: Shuppet is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this Pokémon will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person's home.
sapphiredex: Shuppet grows by feeding on dark emotions, such as vengefulness and envy, in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.
emeralddex: This Pokémon roams about deep in the night seeking such negative emotions as grudges and envy. It retreats to its nest when the sun begins to rise.
frlgdex: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.
dpptdex: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
hgssdex: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice, or so it's said. It's very active at night.
bwdex: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
b2w2dex: It feeds on the dark emotions of sadness and hatred, which make it grow steadily stronger.
xdex: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice--or so it's said. It's very active at night.
ydex: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.

rubydex: Banette generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This Pokémon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
sapphiredex: A cursed energy permeated the stuffing of a discarded and forgotten plush doll, giving it new life as Banette. The Pokémon's energy would escape if it were to ever open its mouth.
emeralddex: An abandoned plush doll became this Pokémon. They are said to live in garbage dumps and wander about in search of the children that threw them away.
frlgdex: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.
dpptdex: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
hgssdex: This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys.
bwdex: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
b2w2dex: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge of being thrown away. It seeks the child who disowned it.
xdex: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
ydex: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

rubydex: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
sapphiredex: Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this Pokémon will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.
emeralddex: A glare from its single scarlet eye makes even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear. It is a nocturnal Pokémon that roams about under the cloak of darkness.
frlgdex: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
dpdex: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
platinumdex: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
hgssdex: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it's said.
bwdex: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
b2w2dex: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.

rubydex: Dusclops's body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
sapphiredex: Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This Pokémon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops's bidding.
emeralddex: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.
frlgdex: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
dpdex: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
platinumdex: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
hgssdex: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
bwdex: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
b2w2dex: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
xdex: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.

rubydex: The bunches of fruit around Tropius's neck are very popular with children. This Pokémon loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
sapphiredex: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of Tropius. This Pokémon flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.
emeralddex: It flies by flapping its broad leaves. The bunch of fruit that grows around its neck is deliciously sweet. In the spring, it scatters pollen from its neck.
frlgdex: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.
dpdex: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.
platinumdex: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
hgssdex: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It's a highly favored tropical snack.
bwdex: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
b2w2dex: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
ydex: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It's a highly favored tropical snack.

rubydex: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in  that have the power to knock foes flying.
sapphiredex: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
emeralddex: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.
frlgdex: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and [[Berry|berries]], which it loves to eat.
diamonddex: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.
pearldex: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
platinumdex: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
hgssdex: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
bwdex: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
b2w2dex: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.

rubydex: Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.
sapphiredex: Absol has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This Pokémon very rarely ventures down from the mountains.
emeralddex: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived Pokémon that has a life-span of 100 years.
frlgdex: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.
dpdex: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
platinumdex: Rumored to sense danger with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
hgssdex: It has the ability to foretell natural disasters. Its life span is over a hundred years.
bwdex: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
b2w2dex: It appears from deep in the mountains to warn people about upcoming disasters it has sensed with its horn.
xdex: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
ydex: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.

rubydex: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.
sapphiredex: Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this Pokémon gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.
emeralddex: A Wynaut loves to eat [[Flavor|sweet]] fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.
frlgdex: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
dpptdex: It grows stronger by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
hgssdex: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
bwdex: It grows stronger by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
b2w2dex: It grows stronger by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
xdex: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

rubydex: Snorunt live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this Pokémon steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
sapphiredex: Snorunt survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this Pokémon is sure to prosper for many generations to come.
emeralddex: They tend to move about in groups of around five Snorunt. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.
frlgdex: It is said that a home visited by a Snorunt will prosper. It can withstand cold of
dpdex: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.
platinumdex: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
hgssdex: It's said that if they are seen at midnight, they'll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.
bwdex: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
b2w2dex: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
ydex: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.

rubydex: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pokémon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
sapphiredex: Glalie has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its foe solid. After immobilizing its foe in ice, this Pokémon enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.
emeralddex: A Glalie has the power to instantaneously freeze moisture in the atmosphere. A dazzling cloud of diamondlike ice crystals forms around its body.
frlgdex: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
dpdex: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
platinumdex: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
hgssdex: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
bwdex: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
b2w2dex: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.

rubydex: Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
sapphiredex: Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives, this Pokémon can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.
emeralddex: It is completely covered with plushy fur. As a result, it never feels the cold even when it is rolling about on ice floes or diving in the sea.
frlgdex: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
dpptdex: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
hgssdex: It crosses the oceans by rolling itself on drifting ice. Fluffy fur keeps it warm when the temperature is below freezing.
bwdex: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
b2w2dex: They can't swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they're happy, they clap fins.
xdex: They can't swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they're happy they clap fins.

rubydex: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This Pokémon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a  on its nose.
sapphiredex: Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the Pokémon is rolling something, it checks the object's aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.
emeralddex: Sealeo live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.
frlgdex: It touches new things with its nose to test for smell and feel. It plays by spinning Spheal on its nose.
dpptdex: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
hgssdex: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
bwdex: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
b2w2dex: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.

rubydex: Walrein's two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This Pokémon's  insulates it from subzero temperatures.
sapphiredex: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
emeralddex: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.
frlgdex: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.
dpptdex: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
hgssdex: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
bwdex: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
b2w2dex: Not only does its thick blubber keep it warm, it also protects it from attacks. It shatters ice with its prized tusks.

rubydex: Clamperl's sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for ing and catching prey. A fully grown Clamperl's shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
sapphiredex: Clamperl grows while being protected by its . When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this Pokémon is getting close to [[evolution]].
emeralddex: A Clamperl slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.
frlgdex: It is protected by a . Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
dpptdex: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
hgssdex: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it's held.
bwdex: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
b2w2dex: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
xdex: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it's held.
ydex: It is protected by a . Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.

rubydex: Huntail's presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This Pokémon's eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
sapphiredex: Huntail's tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This Pokémon swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.
emeralddex: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.
frlgdex: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It  its small fish-like tail to attract prey.
dpptdex: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
hgssdex: It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea. It attracts prey by moving its tail in mimicry of a small animal.
bwdex: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
b2w2dex: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
xdex: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It  its small fishlike tail to attract prey.

rubydex: Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this Pokémon's body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
sapphiredex: Although Gorebyss is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this Pokémon inserts its thin mouth into the prey's body and drains the prey of its body fluids.
emeralddex: A Gorebyss siphons the body fluids of prey through its thin, tubular mouth. Its light pink body color turns vivid when it finishes feeding.
frlgdex: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on  that grows between rocks.
dpptdex: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
hgssdex: Its pink body becomes more vivid with the rise of water temperatures in the [[seasons|springtime]].
bwdex: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
b2w2dex: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
xdex: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
ydex: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on  that grows between rocks.

rubydex: Relicanth is a Pokémon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
sapphiredex: Relicanth is a rare species that was discovered in deep-sea explorations. This Pokémon's body withstands the enormous water pressure of the ocean depths. Its body is covered in tough scales that are like craggy rocks.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.
frlgdex: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
dpptdex: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
hgssdex: Discovered by chance during deep-sea explorations, it has not changed since ancient times.
bwdex: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
b2w2dex: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
xdex: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
ydex: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

rubydex: Luvdisc live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped Pokémon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean's waves.
sapphiredex: Luvdisc's heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and romance. It is said that any couple meeting this Pokémon is promised a loving relationship that never ends.
emeralddex: Luvdisc make the branches of  their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a Luvdisc as a gift to express one's feelings of love.
frlgdex: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
dpptdex: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
hgssdex: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a Luvdisc to someone you love.
bwdex: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
b2w2dex: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
xdex: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
ydex: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.

rubydex: Bagon has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this Pokémon hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
sapphiredex: Bagon harbors a never-ending dream of one day soaring high among the clouds. As if trying to dispel its frustration over its inability to fly, this Pokémon slams its hard head against huge rocks and  them into pebbles.
emeralddex: Although it is small, this Pokémon is very powerful because its body is a bundle of muscles. It launches  with its ironlike skull.
frlgdex: Its steel-hard head can . It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can .
dpptdex: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
hgssdex: Its well-developed neck muscles and ironlike head can smash boulders into pieces.
bwdex: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
b2w2dex: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
xdex: Its well-developed neck muscles and ironlike head can smash boulders into pieces.
ydex: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

rubydex: Inside Shelgon's armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This Pokémon's shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
sapphiredex: Covering Shelgon's body are outgrowths much like bones. The shell is very hard and bounces off enemy attacks. When awaiting evolution, this Pokémon hides away in a cavern.
emeralddex: It hardly eats while it awaits [[evolution]]. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.
frlgdex: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.
dpptdex: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
hgssdex: It surrounds its body in an iron-hard shell to accumulate enough power to evolve.
bwdex: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
b2w2dex: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
xdex: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
ydex: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

rubydex: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokémon's cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
sapphiredex: By evolving into Salamence, this Pokémon finally realizes its long-held dream of growing wings. To express its joy, it  and wheels all over the sky while spouting flames from its mouth.
emeralddex: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and  out of control.
frlgdex: It becomes uncontrollable if enraged. It destroys everything with shredding  and .
dpptdex: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
hgssdex: It's uncontrollable if . It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
bwdex: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
b2w2dex: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
xdex: It becomes uncontrollable if it is . It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
ydex: It's uncontrollable if . It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.

rubydex: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout Beldum's body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
sapphiredex: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth's natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this Pokémon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.
emeralddex: When Beldum gather in a swarm, they move in perfect unison as if they were but one Pokémon. They communicate with each other using brain waves.
frlgdex: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.
dpptdex: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
hgssdex: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
bwdex: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
b2w2dex: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.
xdex: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.

rubydex: When two  fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this Pokémon generates strong psychokinetic power.
sapphiredex: When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. This Pokémon turns its arms to the rear for traveling at high speed.
emeralddex: The claws tipping its arms pack the destructive power to tear through thick iron sheets as if they were silk. It flies at over .
frlgdex: It floats midair using magnetism. Its body is so tough, even a crash with a jet plane won't leave a scratch.
dpptdex: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.
hgssdex: When two Beldum fuse together, a magnetic nervous system places their brains in union.
bwdex: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.
b2w2dex: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its two brains are linked, amplifying its psychic power.
xdex: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.
ydex: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its two brains are linked, amplifying its psychic power.

rubydex: Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This Pokémon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
sapphiredex: Metagross is the result of two  achieving fusion. When hunting, this Pokémon pins the prey to the ground under its massive body. It then eats the helpless victim using the large mouth on its stomach.
emeralddex: Metagross has four brains that are joined by a complex neural network. As a result of integration, this Pokémon is smarter than a supercomputer.
frlgdex: It is formed by two Metang fusing. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.
dpptdex: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
hgssdex: It folds its four legs when flying. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.
bwdex: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
b2w2dex: With four linked brains, it's more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.

rubydex: Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If this Pokémon's body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
sapphiredex: Regirock's body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently, a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all unearthed from different locations.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that is made entirely of rocks and boulders. If parts of its body chip off in battle, Regirock repairs itself by adding new rocks.
frlgdex: It is entirely composed of rocks with no sign of a brain or heart. It is a mystery even to modern scientists.
dpptdex: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
hgssdex: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.
bwdex: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
b2w2dex: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.

rubydex: Regice's body was made during an . The deep-frozen body can't be melted, even by fire. This Pokémon controls frigid air of .
sapphiredex: Regice cloaks itself with frigid air of . Things will freeze solid just by going near this Pokémon. Its icy body is so cold, it will not melt even if it is immersed in magma.
emeralddex: Its entire body is made of  ice. After extensive studies, researchers believe the ice was formed during an .
frlgdex: Research revealed that its body is made of the same kind of ice that is found at the .
dpptdex: Its body is made of ice from the . It controls frigid air of .
hgssdex: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can't be melted, even by magma.
bwdex: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of .
b2w2dex: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of .

rubydex: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this Pokémon eats.
sapphiredex: Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times. The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious substance that is not of this earth.
emeralddex: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.
frlgdex: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.
dpptdex: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
hgssdex: Its body is said to be harder than any kind of metal. A study has revealed that its body is hollow.
bwdex: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
b2w2dex: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.

rubydex: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
sapphiredex: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.
emeralddex: They make a small herd of only several members. They rarely make contact with people or other Pokémon. They disappear if they sense enemies.
frlgdex: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
dpptdex: Its body is covered in a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
hgssdex: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
bwdex: Its body is covered in a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
b2w2dex: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

rubydex: Latios has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.
sapphiredex: Latios will only open its heart to a  with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
emeralddex: Even in hiding, it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.
frlgdex: It has a docile temperament and dislikes fighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it can fly faster than a jet plane.
dpptdex: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
hgssdex: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.
bwdex: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
b2w2dex: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

rubydex: Kyogre has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential . This Pokémon saved people who were suffering from droughts.
sapphiredex: Kyogre is named in mythology as the Pokémon that expanded the sea by covering the land with torrential rains and towering tidal waves. It took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with .
emeralddex: Kyogre has appeared in mythology as the creator of the sea. After long years of feuding with Groudon, it took to sleep at the bottom of the sea.
frlgdex: This Pokémon is said to have expanded the sea by bringing heavy rains. It has the power to control water.
dpptdex: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
hgssdex: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.
bwdex: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
b2w2dex: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.

rubydex: Groudon has long been described in mythology as the Pokémon that raised lands and expanded continents. This Pokémon took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with .
sapphiredex: Groudon has the power to scatter rain clouds and make water evaporate with light and heat. It came as a savior to people who had been suffering from terrible .
emeralddex: Groudon has appeared in mythology as the creator of the land. It sleeps in magma underground and is said to make volcanoes  on awakening.
frlgdex: This legendary Pokémon is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling Kyogre.
dpptdex: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
hgssdex: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.
bwdex: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
b2w2dex: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.

rubydex: Rayquaza lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth's ozone layer, never descending to the ground. This Pokémon appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.
sapphiredex: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth's ozone layer, above the clouds. Its existence had been completely unknown because it lived so high in the sky.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that flies endlessly in the ozone layer. It is said it would descend to the ground if  and  were to fight.
frlgdex: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.
dpptdex: It cannot be seen from ground level since it lives far up above the clouds in the ozone layer.
hgssdex: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
bwdex: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
b2w2dex: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

rubydex: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any  that is written on the notes attached to head when it awakens. If this Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
sapphiredex: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.
emeralddex: Jirachi is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.
frlgdex: It is said to make any wish come true. It is only awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.
dpptdex: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
hgssdex: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
bwdex: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
b2w2dex: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.

rubydex: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon's chest appears to be its brain.
sapphiredex: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
emeralddex: A Pokémon that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.
firereddex: This Deoxys has transformed into its aggressive guise. It can fool enemies by altering its appearance.
leafgreendex: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
dpptdex: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
hgssdex: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
bwdex: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
b2w2dex: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.

diamonddex: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.
pearldex: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.
platinumdex: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.
hgssdex: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.
bwdex: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.
b2w2dex: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.

diamonddex: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
pearldex: The shell is hardened soil. Some Pokémon come to peck the berries growing on the trees on its back.
platinumdex: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
hgssdex: A Grotle that lives in the forest is said to have its own secret springwater.
bwdex: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
b2w2dex: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

diamonddex: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
pearldex: Groups of this Pokémon migrating in search of water have been mistaken for "moving forests."
platinumdex: Some Pokémon are born on a Torterra's back and spend their entire life there.
hgssdex: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
bwdex: Some Pokémon are born on a Torterra's back and spend their entire life there.
b2w2dex: Some Pokémon are born on a Torterra's back and spend their entire life there.

diamonddex: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.
pearldex: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.
platinumdex: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.
