hgssdex: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.
bwdex: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.
b2w2dex: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.

diamonddex: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.
pearldex: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.
platinumdex: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
hgssdex: A bigger fire on its tail and a brighter blue pattern on its face means its rank in its pack is higher.
bwdex: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
b2w2dex: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

diamonddex: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving . Its fire never goes out.
pearldex: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
platinumdex: It uses unique fighting moves with fire on its  and . It will take on any opponent.
hgssdex: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.
bwdex: It uses unique fighting moves with fire on its hands and feet. It will take on any opponent.
b2w2dex: It uses unique fighting moves with fire on its hands and feet. It will take on any opponent.

diamonddex: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.
pearldex: It lives along shores in northern countries. A skilled swimmer, it dives for over 10 minutes to hunt.
platinumdex: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.
hgssdex: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
bwdex: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.
b2w2dex: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.

diamonddex: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
pearldex: Its wings deliver wicked blows that snap even the thickest of trees. It searches for prey in icy seas.
platinumdex: Because every Prinplup considers itself to be the most important, they can never form a group.
hgssdex: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.
bwdex: Because every Prinplup considers itself to be the most important, they can never form a group.
b2w2dex: Because every Prinplup considers itself to be the most important, they can never form a group.

diamonddex: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
pearldex: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
platinumdex: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.
hgssdex: It avoids unnecessary disputes, but it will decimate anything that threatens its pride.
bwdex: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.
b2w2dex: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.

diamonddex: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
pearldex: Usually with a large flock, it is barely noticeable when alone. Its [[cry|cries]] are very strident.
platinumdex: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.
hgssdex: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
bwdex: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.
b2w2dex: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.
xdex: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
ydex: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

diamonddex: It flies around forests and fields in search of  Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.
pearldex: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.
platinumdex: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.
hgssdex: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
bwdex: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.
b2w2dex: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.
xdex: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
ydex: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.

diamonddex: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.
pearldex: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.
platinumdex: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.
hgssdex: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
bwdex: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.
b2w2dex: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.
xdex: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.
ydex: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

diamonddex: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
pearldex: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.
platinumdex: A comparison revealed that Bidoof's front teeth grow at the same rate as 's.
hgssdex: It lives in groups by the water. It chews up boulders and trees around its nest with its incisors.
bwdex: A comparison revealed that Bidoof's front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattata's.
b2w2dex: A comparison revealed that Bidoof's front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattata's.
xdex: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
ydex: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

diamonddex: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
pearldex: While its movements out of water are sluggish, it can swim as fast as any .
platinumdex: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.
hgssdex: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
bwdex: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.
b2w2dex: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.
xdex: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
ydex: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

diamonddex: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a .
pearldex: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
platinumdex: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.
hgssdex: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.
bwdex: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.
b2w2dex: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

diamonddex: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
pearldex: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.
platinumdex: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.
hgssdex: By allowing its [[cry]] to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces a captivating sound.
bwdex: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.
b2w2dex: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.

diamonddex: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
pearldex: Its forelegs have a muscle-based system of generating electricity. Its body shines if endangered.
platinumdex: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
hgssdex: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. Its fur glows when it's in trouble.
bwdex: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
b2w2dex: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
xdex: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

diamonddex: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
pearldex: It rests its forelegs on others to communicate with rhythmic electric pulses from its claws.
platinumdex: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
hgssdex: By gathering their tails together, they collectively generate powerful electricity from their claws.
bwdex: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
b2w2dex: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

diamonddex: It has eyes which can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.
pearldex: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey--even those taking shelter behind a wall.
platinumdex: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.
hgssdex: Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.
bwdex: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.
b2w2dex: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

diamonddex: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
pearldex: It lives alongside clear ponds. It scatters pollen that induces harsh sneezing and runny noses.
platinumdex: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud is said to bloom when it feels the sun's warm touch.
hgssdex: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
bwdex: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud is said to bloom when it feels the sun's warm touch.
b2w2dex: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud blooms when it's warm, releasing toxic pollen.
xdex: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
ydex: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

diamonddex: It attracts prey with a , then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.
pearldex: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
platinumdex: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
hgssdex: Its sweet aroma attracts prey. Then it spews poison. The more toxic it is, the sweeter its aroma.
bwdex: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
b2w2dex: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.

diamonddex: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.
pearldex: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its s.
platinumdex: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
hgssdex: Cranidos toughen up their already rock-hard heads by  one another.
bwdex: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
b2w2dex: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
xdex: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.

diamonddex: Its  has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.
pearldex: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
platinumdex: If two were to smash their heads together, their foot-thick skulls would keep them from fainting.
hgssdex: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
bwdex: If two were to smash their heads together, their foot-thick skulls would keep them from fainting.
b2w2dex: If two were to smash their heads together, their foot-thick skulls would keep them from fainting.

diamonddex: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.
pearldex: It habitually  its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
platinumdex: It is outstandingly armored. As a result, it can eat grass and berries without having to fight.
hgssdex: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a  face.
bwdex: It is outstandingly armored. As a result, it can eat grass and berries without having to fight.
b2w2dex: It is outstandingly armored. As a result, it can eat grass and berries without having to fight.

diamonddex: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
pearldex: When attacked, they form a wall with their shield like faces to protect their young.
platinumdex: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
hgssdex: When attacked, they form a wall. Their rock-hard faces serve to protect them from the attacks.
bwdex: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
b2w2dex: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.

diamonddex: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
pearldex: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
platinumdex: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
hgssdex: It covers itself with a cloak to shelter from the cold. When it's hot, its cloak is thinner.
bwdex: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
b2w2dex: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
xdex: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
ydex: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

diamonddex: It loves the [[honey]] of flowers and steals honey collected by .
pearldex: It does not keep a nest. It flies over fields and mountains in constant search of floral honey.
platinumdex: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
hgssdex: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
bwdex: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
b2w2dex: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.
ydex: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

diamonddex: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to .
pearldex: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
platinumdex: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
hgssdex: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
bwdex: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
b2w2dex: This Pokémon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
xdex: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
ydex: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

diamonddex: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by .
pearldex: When endangered, grubs from its six-cell honeycomb strike back. There is only one in a colony.
platinumdex: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.
hgssdex: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee.
bwdex: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.
b2w2dex: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
xdex: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
ydex: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs.  It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.

diamonddex: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
pearldex: It makes electricity with pouches in its cheeks and shoots charges from its tail. It lives atop trees.
platinumdex: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
hgssdex: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.
bwdex: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
b2w2dex: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
xdex: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
ydex: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

diamonddex: It has a floatation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.
pearldex: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
platinumdex: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.
hgssdex: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.
bwdex: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.
b2w2dex: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.
xdex: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.

diamonddex: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
pearldex: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
platinumdex: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.
hgssdex: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.
bwdex: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.
b2w2dex: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.
xdex: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
ydex: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

diamonddex: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for [[evolution]]. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
pearldex: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald [[evolution]].
platinumdex: The small ball is not only full of nutrients, it is also tasty.  try to peck it off.
hgssdex: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
bwdex: The small ball is not only full of nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
b2w2dex: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.

diamonddex: It blooms during times of strong [[Weather conditions#Intense sunlight|sunlight]]. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.
pearldex: It is docile as a bud, but turns cheerful when it blooms. It folds back into a bud if sunlight wanes.
platinumdex: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.
hgssdex: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
bwdex: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.
b2w2dex: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.

diamonddex: Its color and shapes differ from [[region]] to region. In the [[Sinnoh]] region, two types are confirmed.
pearldex: It lives along bodies of water. Its body shape has changed to suit its habitat.
platinumdex: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
hgssdex: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.
bwdex: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
b2w2dex: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
ydex: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.

diamonddex: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.
pearldex: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
platinumdex: Long ago, its entire back was shielded with a sturdy shell. There are traces of it left in its cells.
hgssdex: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
bwdex: Long ago, its entire back was shielded with a sturdy shell. There are traces of it left in its cells.
b2w2dex: Long ago, its entire back was shielded with a sturdy shell. There are traces of it left in its cells.
xdex: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
ydex: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.

diamonddex: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
pearldex: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
platinumdex: Split into two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things, Ambipom rarely uses its hands.
heartgolddex: They live on large trees. They are said to communicate by connecting their tails to those of others.
soulsilverdex: It is very difficult to dodge the  of its two tails.
bwdex: Split into two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things, Ambipom rarely uses its hands.
b2w2dex: Split into two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things, Ambipom rarely uses its hands.
xdex: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.

diamonddex: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
pearldex: It tugs on the hands of children to steal them away. However, it gets pulled around instead.
platinumdex: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a "Signpost for Wandering Spirits."
hgssdex: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.
bwdex: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a "Signpost for Wandering Spirits."
b2w2dex: These Pokémon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.
xdex: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
ydex: These Pokémon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.

diamonddex: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
pearldex: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
platinumdex: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.
hgssdex: It can generate and release gas within its body. That's how it can control the altitude of its drift.
bwdex: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.
b2w2dex: They carry people and Pokémon, but the wind can catch them, so there can't be a fixed destination.
ydex: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

diamonddex: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

platinumdex: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
hgssdex: You can tell how it feels by the way it rolls its ears. When it's scared, both ears are rolled up.
bwdex: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
b2w2dex: By extending its rolled-up ears and striking the ground, it can bound so high it surprises itself.

hgssdex: It sheds its fur twice a year. Its winter fur is soft and fluffy.
bwdex: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
b2w2dex: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.

diamonddex: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

hgssdex: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
bwdex: Its cry sounds like incantation. It is said that the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
b2w2dex: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said that the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.

diamonddex: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous  in tow.

hgssdex: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its  followers.
bwdex: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
b2w2dex: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
ydex: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous  in tow.

diamonddex: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
pearldex: With its sharp glare, it puts foes in a mild . It is a very fickle Pokémon.
platinumdex: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its  if it isn't fed.
hgssdex: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
bwdex: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn't fed.
b2w2dex: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn't fed.

diamonddex: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon's nest and claims it as its own.

xdex: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

blackdex: dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.
