blackdex: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
whitedex: They go wherever the wind takes them. On rainy days, their bodies are heavier, so they take shelter beneath big trees.
b2w2dex: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

blackdex: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
whitedex: Riding whirlwinds, they appear. These Pokémon sneak through gaps into houses and cause all sorts of mischief.
b2w2dex: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.

blackdex: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
whitedex: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
b2w2dex: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.
xdex: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
ydex: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.

blackdex: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
whitedex: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
b2w2dex: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.

blackdex: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they'll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.
whitedex: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.
b2w2dex: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
xdex: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
ydex: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.

blackdex: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
whitedex: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
b2w2dex: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.
xdex: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
ydex: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

blackdex: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
whitedex: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings, even in darkness.
b2w2dex: Protected by thin membranes, their eyes can see even in the dead of night. They live in groups of a few individuals.
xdex: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
ydex: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.

blackdex: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
whitedex: It can expand the focus of its eyes, enabling it to see objects in the far distance as if it were using binoculars.
b2w2dex: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
xdex: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.

blackdex: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.
whitedex: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
b2w2dex: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to .

blackdex: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.
whitedex: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
b2w2dex: When it moves rhythmically, it makes a sound similar to maracas, making the surprised Pokémon flee.
ydex: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.

blackdex: This Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.
whitedex: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
b2w2dex: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
xdex: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
ydex: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.

blackdex: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
whitedex: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
b2w2dex: When its boulder is broken in battles for territory, it feels unsure and begins to weaken.
xdex: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
ydex: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

blackdex: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling it skin up to its neck.
whitedex: It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.
b2w2dex: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
xdex: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
ydex: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.

blackdex: Groups of them beat up anything that enter their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.
whitedex: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
b2w2dex: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.

blackdex: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.
whitedex: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
b2w2dex: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
xdex: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
ydex: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.

blackdex: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
whitedex: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves in past ages. Each retains memories of its former life.
b2w2dex: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.

blackdex: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
whitedex: They pretend to be elaborate coffins to teach lessons to grave robbers. Their bodies are covered in pure gold.
b2w2dex: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

blackdex: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
whitedex: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
b2w2dex: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. It swam skillfully and dove to depths beyond half a mile.
ydex: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

blackdex: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
whitedex: Incredible jaw strength enables them to chew up steel beams and rocks along with their prey.
b2w2dex: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.

blackdex: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
whitedex: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
b2w2dex: It was revived from an ancient fossil. Not able to fly, it lived in treetops and hopped from one branch to another.
ydex: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

blackdex: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
whitedex: It runs better than it flies. It catches prey by running at speeds comparable to those of an automobile.
b2w2dex: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.

blackdex: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
whitedex: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
b2w2dex: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.
xdex: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
ydex: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

blackdex: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling  belched from its mouth.
whitedex: They absorb garbage and make it part of their bodies. They shoot  from their right-hand fingertips.
b2w2dex: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
xdex: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
ydex: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

blackdex: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
whitedex: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
b2w2dex: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
xdex: It changes so it looks like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
ydex: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

blackdex: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
whitedex: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
b2w2dex: Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were trapped in an illusion and punished.
ydex: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
xdex: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

blackdex: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.
whitedex: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
b2w2dex: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
xdex: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
ydex: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.

blackdex: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.
whitedex: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
b2w2dex: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.

blackdex: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
whitedex: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
b2w2dex: It stares intently at everything. It can become so obsessed with watching that it doesn't notice attacks.
xdex: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

blackdex: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.
whitedex: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
b2w2dex: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
xdex: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
ydex: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

blackdex: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
whitedex: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.
b2w2dex: It can see the future from the movement of the stars. When it learns its Trainer's life span, it cries in sadness.
xdex: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
ydex: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.

blackdex: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
whitedex: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they can survive in any environment.
b2w2dex: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
xdex: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
ydex: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

blackdex: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
whitedex: When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximum power.
b2w2dex: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.
ydex: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

blackdex: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
whitedex: These remarkably intelligent Pokémon fight by controlling arms that can grip with [[Rock Smash (move)|rock-crushing power.]]
b2w2dex: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
ydex: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

blackdex: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.
whitedex: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
b2w2dex: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
xdex: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
ydex: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

blackdex: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
whitedex: It administers sharp, powerful pecks with its bill. It whips its long neck to deliver forceful repeated strikes.
b2w2dex: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
xdex: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
ydex: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

blackdex: The temperature of their breath is . They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
whitedex: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
b2w2dex: Theoretically, this Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is .
xdex: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
ydex: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

blackdex: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
whitedex: It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.
b2w2dex: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

blackdex: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.
whitedex: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
b2w2dex: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

blackdex: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.
whitedex: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
b2w2dex: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.

blackdex: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.
whitedex: The plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leaders of the herd possess magnificent horns.
b2w2dex: They migrate according to seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
xdex: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.

blackdex: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membranes and released while it is gliding.
whitedex: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
b2w2dex: It glides on its outstretched membrane while shocking foes with the electricity stored in the pouches on its cheeks.
xdex: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
ydex: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membranes and released while it is gliding.

blackdex: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as .
whitedex: When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. This Pokémon targets .
b2w2dex: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking .
xdex: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as .
ydex: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking .

blackdex: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.
whitedex: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a . The steel armor protects their whole body.
b2w2dex: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
xdex: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
ydex: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a . The steel armor protects their whole body.

blackdex: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
whitedex: For some reason, this Pokémon resembles a Poké Ball. They release poison spores to repel those who try to catch them.
b2w2dex: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball then releases poison spores.
xdex: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
ydex: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball then releases poison spores.

blackdex: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.
whitedex: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.
b2w2dex: It moves the caps on both arms and does a dance to lure prey. It prefers damp places.
xdex: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.
ydex: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.

blackdex: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.
whitedex: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs,  below the surface.
b2w2dex: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.

blackdex: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
whitedex: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. Their favorite food is life energy.
b2w2dex: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

blackdex: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.
whitedex: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
b2w2dex: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
xdex: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
ydex: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

blackdex: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.
whitedex: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.
b2w2dex: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.

blackdex: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
whitedex: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
b2w2dex: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense.
xdex: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
ydex: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

blackdex: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
whitedex: They stick their spikes into cave walls and absorb the minerals they find in the rock.
b2w2dex: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
xdex: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
ydex: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.

blackdex: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.
whitedex: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.
b2w2dex: By swinging around its three spiky feels and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
ydex: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.

blackdex: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
whitedex: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
b2w2dex: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. They spin around each other to generate energy.

blackdex: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
whitedex: Spinning minigears are rotated at high speed and repeatedly fired away. It is dangerous if the gears don't return.
b2w2dex: A minigear and big gear comprises its body. If the minigear it launches at its foe doesn't return, it will die.
ydex: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn't return, it will die.

blackdex: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
whitedex: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
b2w2dex: The minigear spins at high speed. Then the energy from the red core charges the minigear to make it ready to fire.

blackdex: While one alone doesn't have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
whitedex: These Pokémon move in schools. They have an electricity-generating organ, so they discharge electricity if in danger.
b2w2dex: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.

blackdex: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.
whitedex: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
b2w2dex: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.

blackdex: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
whitedex: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
b2w2dex: It latches on to prey with its sucker mouth, sinking in its fangs and shocking the prey with powerful electricity.

blackdex: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.
whitedex: This Pokémon had never been seen until it appeared from far in the desert 50 years ago.
b2w2dex: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

blackdex: It can manipulate an opponent's memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.
whitedex: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.
b2w2dex: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.

blackdex: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
whitedex: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
b2w2dex: Its flame is usually out, but it starts shining when it absorbs life force from people or Pokémon.
xdex: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
ydex: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

blackdex: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.
whitedex: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
b2w2dex: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
xdex: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
ydex: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.

blackdex: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.
whitedex: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
b2w2dex: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.
xdex: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

blackdex: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
whitedex: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
b2w2dex: Its large tusks have a tendency to break, but each time they grow back, they grow in harder and sturdier.
xdex: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
ydex: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

blackdex: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they've been fighting.
whitedex: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
b2w2dex: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
xdex: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
ydex: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

blackdex: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
whitedex: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.
b2w2dex: Its tusks are incredibly destructive. They can easily slice through a thick, sturdy steel column every time.
ydex: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.

blackdex: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.
whitedex: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
b2w2dex: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
xdex: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
ydex: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.

blackdex: It can make its breath freeze at will. , it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.
whitedex: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
b2w2dex: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
xdex: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
ydex: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.

blackdex: When its body temperature goes up, it . When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.
whitedex: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
b2w2dex: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at .
xdex: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
ydex: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at .

blackdex: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.
whitedex: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with . The reason is still unknown.
b2w2dex: When it and  are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
xdex: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
ydex: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with . The reason is still unknown.

blackdex: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
whitedex: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
b2w2dex: When its body dries out, it weakens. So it wraps a membrane around itself for protection while it spits poison.
xdex: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
ydex: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

blackdex: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
whitedex: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
b2w2dex: When its opponent can't be paralyzed, it contorts itself with unexpected speed and flops away.
xdex: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
ydex: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.

blackdex: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
whitedex: They have mastered elegant combos. As they concentrate, their battle moves become swifter and more precise.
b2w2dex: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
xdex: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
ydex: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

blackdex: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
whitedex: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents.
b2w2dex: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
xdex: It wields the fur on its arm like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
ydex: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.

blackdex: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
whitedex: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
b2w2dex: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.
xdex: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
ydex: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

blackdex: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
whitedex: These Pokémon are thought to have been created by the science of an ancient and mysterious civilization.
b2w2dex: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.
xdex: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
ydex: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.

blackdex: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
whitedex: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.
b2w2dex: Golurk were created to protect people and Pokémon. They run on a mysterious energy.
xdex: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

blackdex: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
whitedex: They fight at 's command. They cling to their prey and inflict damage by sinking their blades into it.
b2w2dex: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
xdex: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
ydex: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

blackdex: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.
whitedex: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of . Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
b2w2dex: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
ydex: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.

blackdex: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
whitedex: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
b2w2dex: They are known to charge so wildly that if a train were to enter their territory, they would send it flying.

blackdex: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
whitedex: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
b2w2dex: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.
xdex: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
ydex: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

blackdex: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
whitedex: The more scars they have, the more respect these brave soldiers of the sky get from their peers.
b2w2dex: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.
xdex: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.

blackdex: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
whitedex: They tend to guard their posteriors with suitable bones they have found. They pursue weak Pokémon.
b2w2dex: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by .
xdex: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
ydex: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

blackdex: It makes a nest out of the bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.
whitedex: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
b2w2dex: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.

blackdex: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.
whitedex: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
b2w2dex: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
xdex: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
ydex: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

blackdex: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
whitedex: Durant dig nests in mountains. They build their complicated, interconnected tunnels in mazes.
b2w2dex: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
xdex: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
ydex: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

blackdex: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.
whitedex: They cannot see, so they  and  to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
b2w2dex: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.
xdex: They cannot see, so they  and  to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
ydex: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.

blackdex: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.
whitedex: Since their two heads do not get along and compete with each other for food, they always eat too much.
b2w2dex: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
xdex: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
ydex: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

blackdex: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.
whitedex: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
b2w2dex: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!
xdex: Their heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
ydex: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!

blackdex: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.
whitedex: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
b2w2dex: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
xdex: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
ydex: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

blackdex: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
whitedex: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
b2w2dex: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokémon from freezing.
xdex: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

blackdex: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.
whitedex: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.
b2w2dex: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.

blackdex: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
whitedex: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.
b2w2dex: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.

blackdex: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.
whitedex: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
b2w2dex: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

blackdex: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at .
whitedex: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
b2w2dex: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.

blackdex: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.
whitedex: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
b2w2dex: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

blackdex: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
whitedex: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.
b2w2dex: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

blackdex: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
whitedex: This Pokémon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.
b2w2dex: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

blackdex: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
whitedex: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.
b2w2dex: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

blackdex: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
whitedex: It can produce ultracold air. Its body is frozen.
b2w2dex: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

blackdex: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.
whitedex: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
b2w2dex: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

blackdex: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by [[Team Plasma]].
whitedex: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
b2w2dex: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

xdex: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
ydex: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.

xdex: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
ydex: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.

xdex: Its  is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.
ydex: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

xdex: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.
ydex: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

xdex: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.
ydex: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

xdex: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
ydex: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degree Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

xdex: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
ydex: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

xdex: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
ydex: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.

xdex: It creates . When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
ydex: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

xdex: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
ydex: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

xdex: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
ydex: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it's finished digging, it lounges lazily.

xdex: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
ydex: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

xdex: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
ydex: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.

xdex: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
ydex: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

xdex: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
ydex: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.

xdex: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
ydex: The beaks of birds can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.

xdex: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.
ydex: The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

xdex: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
ydex: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to fight.

xdex: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
ydex: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride’s cubs.

xdex: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.
ydex: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.

xdex: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the power of flowers to battle.
ydex: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

xdex: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
ydex: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.

xdex: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
ydex: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn't need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.

xdex: It can tell how its trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathetic sense lets them run as if one being.
ydex: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

xdex: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
ydex: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning it anyone pats its head.

xdex: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
ydex: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

xdex: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
ydex: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.

xdex: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
ydex: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.

xdex: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck to dust.
ydex: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

xdex: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
ydex: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.

xdex: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.
ydex: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.

xdex: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.
ydex: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

xdex: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.
ydex: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.

xdex: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
ydex: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

xdex: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and as sticky as cotton candy.
ydex: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

xdex: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
ydex: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human's, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It's like it can see with its nose!

xdex: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
ydex: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

xdex: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.
ydex: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

xdex: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
ydex: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

xdex: When they evolve, two  multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
ydex: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.

xdex: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
ydex: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.

xdex: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
ydex: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.

xdex: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.
ydex: Through controlled expulsions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.

xdex: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
ydex: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

xdex: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
ydex: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

xdex: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
ydex: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the  in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

xdex: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
ydex: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.

xdex: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
ydex: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.

xdex: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
ydex: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

xdex: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
ydex: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack.

xdex: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
ydex: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.

xdex: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like  and .
ydex: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

xdex: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
ydex: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

xdex: Born from temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
ydex: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It's occasionally found during the excavation of caves.

xdex: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.
ydex: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.

xdex: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.
ydex: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.

xdex: This very friendly -type Pokemon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
ydex: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.

xdex: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
ydex: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.

xdex: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
ydex: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.

xdex: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
ydex: Using it roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.

xdex: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
ydex: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

xdex: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
ydex: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

xdex: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.
ydex: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.

xdex: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
ydex: The way several  huddle on its back make it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.

xdex: They live in pitch black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
ydex: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.

xdex: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
ydex: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.

xdex: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
ydex: When the horns on its head shine in seven different colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

xdex: When this legendary Pokémon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of all living creatures.
ydex: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

xdex: When the [[Kalos]] region's ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
ydex: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
